name: Witch Tower
description:
Face many enemies and final bosses after each stage of the tower until you reach the top of the tower.

Witch Tower puts you in the role of a witch defending her fairy friend along various levels infested with monsters and challenges.

Each time you defeat an enemy, your friend will reward you with a random prize to help you on the journey.

==========

Currently the game of Witch Tower is under development, with each update will be adding new levels and challenges.

All your comments are read and taken into account, your answers are very important to us.
